subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
B . dentriticus : Istituto Sperimentale
per la Zoologia Agraria, Firenze, Italy ; of
L . fimbriatus
: National Museum of Ireland , (cited as Irish National Museum), Dublin, Ireland ; of
S . amboinensis
: not stated.

TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
B . dentriticus : Firenze
, Italy , in pigeon nest; of
L . fimbriatus
: North Dublin, Ireland , on sprouting potatoes; of
S . amboinensis
: Ambon Island, Indonesia , in a tube with a microchiroptera parasite ( sic ).
